name: Tristitia
description:
Tristitia in Latin means sadness. The game is telling the journey of a small creature called Lucas.  Get ready to be submerged in a completely fresh platformer experience made by 2 people for the 2020 GMTK game jam. 

Creators : Omar Emad : instagram (graveboiart) and   Youssof kandil

                    

Play in full screen if you use browser please !
